attributes.action: The prime minister and allministers should have smaller cars and tak a substancialk pay cut now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OK so the world climate is changing but we are paying more taxes if all the politicians and the priminister where paid less wges and drove more fuel efficient vehicles we could use the savings on their astranomical wages on climate change a\nd if they drove smaller cars well then they could justify the Stealth grean fuel tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
